q: Andy Coulson had resigned as the editor of the News of the World. Alexandra Marzec, representing Glenn Mulcaire , said there was no clear evidence that her client had intercepted Steve Coogan or Andy Gray 's messages. Mr Steve Coogan has not yet gone to the trouble of making an application to the Metropolitan police to see what documentary evidence there is, she said. She said none of the evidence showed there was any interception.
